abstract: Citigroup named Raymond J. McGuire, one of its most senior deal-makers, as its sole head of global investment banking, amid another management reshuffling at the bank. Read the internal memo on DealBook.
snippet: Citigroup named Raymond J. McGuire, one of its most senior deal-makers, as its sole head of global investment banking, amid another management reshuffling at the bank. Read the internal memo on DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Amid Citigroup‘s continued management reshuffles, the embattled financial giant is keeping at least one senior banker in place: veteran deal maker Raymond J. McGuire.

headline.main: Citi Names McGuire as Sole Head of Global Banking
